Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
nightclothes \nightclothes\ n. garments designed to be worn in bed, such as {pyjamas}, a {nightgown}, etc.
Syn: nightwear. [WordNet 1.5]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Nightgown \Night"gown`\, n. A loose gown used for undress; also, a gown used for a sleeping garment. [1913 Webster]
nightgown n : lingerie consisting of a loose dress designed to be worn in bed by women [syn: {nightie}, {night-robe}, {nightdress}]
